articles.title: 7 Mobile Apps That Create Quality Visual Content
articles.description: High quality content is a vital element to the development of a strong web presence. Written content is often a prime focus, but the importance of visuals should not be overlooked. Visuals can also positively impact engagement on social media. There are a number of helpful apps that allow you to create visual content via your smartphone or tablet. The seven featured in this article offer a variety of editing features to simplify the process of creating effective visual web content.
